user_query: the bullet was in a very delicate position right or wrong the doctors didn't want to risk taking it out so with every step I take there's a chance of my bone marrow I can walk but to my death I see here that uh after you were discharged from the hospital you ever have any romantic relationships there was one actually hello Douglas right do you know Shakespeare oh my God I'm about to change your world put on makeup if you didn't like your reflection you just had to change it you know nothing proves that the reflection in the mirror is fake and we are real I've never met anyone like her you can do anything you want you can be a king or a prince you can be a beggar or a flower anything you choose okay okay theater was like a religion your proposition that the true believer experiences as reality you can play Shakespeare you can play anything mother you have offended my father when I was alive at last I could fully express myself my whole body in this new kingdom Selma was my princess you loved her did you tell her I was getting ready to but one day she left the theater group in Boston suburbs had hired her talent deserved far better than a home for juvenile delinquents did you lose track of her I followed her every step she struggled but Selma had too much talent and eventually was able to get the courage she was beautiful sorry to bother you Selma that someone here says he's your number one fan he knows you and can he say hi sure I wanted to throw these to you at the end but I

entities.entity_description: Douglas는 총알이 몸에 박힌 채로 살아가는 인물로, 병원 퇴원 후 로맨틱한 관계를 가졌던 캐릭터이다
Selma는 연극을 종교처럼 여기는 재능 있는 연극 배우로, 청소년 보호시설에서 보스턴 교외의 극단으로 옮겨간 인물이다
Shakespeare는 극중에서 언급되는 유명 극작가로, Douglas가 Selma에게 소개받은 작품의 작가이다

relationships.relationship_description: Douglas는 Selma를 사랑했으며 그녀를 자신의 공주라고 여겼고, 그녀의 모든 행보를 따라갔다
Selma는 셰익스피어 연극을 공연했으며 연극을 종교처럼 여겼다
